languages.text: "Ксенос причинил слишком много вреда Человечеству, и правосудие требует, чтобы..." {n}Арбитр запинается.{/n} "Нет, не могу врать самому себе — не хочу, чтобы кто-то из рода людского марал оружие об этого выродка. Пусть его сожрут ему подобные".

"This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."
languages.original_text: "Ксенос причинил слишком много вреда Человечеству, и правосудие требует, чтобы..." {n}Арбитр запинается.{/n} "Нет, не могу врать самому себе — не хочу, чтобы кто-то из рода людского марал оружие об этого выродка. Пусть его сожрут ему подобные".

traits.locale_text: "This xenos's actions have done Humanity great harm, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon by killing that scumbag. Let his own kind devour him."

"This xenos's actions have done Humanity great harm, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon by killing that scumbag. Let his own kind devour him."

"This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

"This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

"This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

"This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

languages.text: “这个异形的行为对人类造成了巨大的伤害，正义必须——”{n}索罗蒙迟疑了片刻。{/n}“不，我不愿自欺欺人。老实说，我不希望任何人杀死这个渣滓，玷污了他们的武器。愿他死在他的族人手上。”
languages.original_text: "This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

traits.locale_text: “这个异形的行为对人类造成了巨大的伤害，正义必须——”{n}索罗蒙迟疑了片刻。{/n}“不，我不愿自欺欺人。老实说，我不希望任何人杀死这个渣滓，玷污了他们的武器。愿他死在他的族人手上。”

languages.text: «Las acciones de este xenos han causado mucho daño a la Humanidad. La justicia exige que...». {n}Solomorne flaquea.{/n} «No. No puedo mentirme a mí mismo. No quiero que ningún humano mancille su arma matando a esa inmundicia. Es mejor que lo devore su propia especie».
languages.original_text: "This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

traits.locale_text: «Las acciones de este xenos han causado mucho daño a la Humanidad. La justicia exige que...». {n}Solomorne flaquea.{/n} «No. No puedo mentirme a mí mismo. No quiero que ningún humano mancille su arma matando a esa inmundicia. Es mejor que lo devore su propia especie».

languages.text: « Les actions de ce xénos ont gravement nui à l'humanité, et la justice exige que... {n}avance Solomorne avant de s'interrompre.{/n} Non, je ne peux pas continuer : je n'ai aucune envie qu'un humain souille sa lame en tuant cette ordure. Laissons-le se faire dévorer par ses pairs. »
languages.original_text: "This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

traits.locale_text: « Les actions de ce xénos ont gravement nui à l'humanité, et la justice exige que... {n}avance Solomorne avant de s'interrompre.{/n} Non, je ne peux pas continuer : je n'ai aucune envie qu'un humain souille sa lame en tuant cette ordure. Laissons-le se faire dévorer par ses pairs. »

languages.text: 「この異種族の行動は人類に大きな害をもたらしました。正義のために…」{n}ソロモーンは言いよどんだ。{/n}「いえ、自分に嘘はつけません…あんなクズを殺すことで、人間の誰かが自分の武器を穢すのは見たくありません。あいつは、自分の同族に始末されればいい」
languages.original_text: "This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

traits.locale_text: 「この異種族の行動は人類に大きな害をもたらしました。正義のために…」{n}ソロモーンは言いよどんだ。{/n}「いえ、自分に嘘はつけません…あんなクズを殺すことで、人間の誰かが自分の武器を穢すのは見たくありません。あいつは、自分の同族に始末されればいい」

languages.text: "Bu zenonun eylemleri İnsanlığa büyük zarar verdi. Adaletin gerektirdiğiyse..." {n}Solomorne duraksıyor.{/n} "Hayır, kendime yalan söyleyemem. O alçağı öldürerek hiçbir insanın silahını kirletmesini istemiyorum. Kendi türü yutsun onu."
languages.original_text: "This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

traits.locale_text: "Bu zenonun eylemleri İnsanlığa büyük zarar verdi ve adalet şunu gerektiriyor ki..." {n}Solomorne duraksıyor.{/n} "Hayır, kendime yalan söyleyemem. O alçağı öldürerek hiçbir insanın silahını kirletmesini istemiyorum. Kendi türü tarafından yutulsun."

languages.text: "Das Handeln dieses Xenos hat der Menschheit großen Schaden zugefügt, und die Gerechtigkeit verlangt, dass ..." {n}Solomorne hält inne.{/n} "Nein, ich kann mich nicht selbst belügen – kein Mensch soll seine Waffe dadurch besudeln, dass er diesen Dreckskerl tötet. Lasst ihn von den Seinen verschlingen."
languages.original_text: "This xenos's actions have done great harm to Humanity, and justice demands that—" {n}Solomorne falters.{/n} "No, I can't lie to myself — I don't want any human being to sully their weapon with killing that scumbag. Let him be devoured by his own kind."

traits.locale_text: "Das Handeln dieses Xenos hat der Menschheit großen Schaden zugefügt, und die Gerechtigkeit verlangt, dass ..." {n}Solomorne hält inne.{/n} "Nein, ich kann mich nicht selbst belügen – kein Mensch soll seine Waffe dadurch besudeln, dass er diesen Dreckskerl tötet. Lasst ihn von den Seinen verschlingen."
